mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(p.UPPR_RPLY_ID) FROM RPLY_HSTR AS p LEFT JOIN RPLY_HSTR AS c ON p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = c.RPLY_ID WHERE p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = #{upprRplyId}
select RPLY_ID,RPLY_CTT,REG_DTM,POI_ID from RPLY_HSTR where POI_ID = #{poiId} and UPPR_RPLY_ID = 0 or UPPR_RPLY_ID = null order by REG_DTM desc limit 5
select RPLY_ID,RPLY_CTT,REG_DTM,CONT_TYPE_ID from RPLY_HSTR where CONT_TYPE_ID = #{contTypeId} and UPPR_RPLY_ID = 0 or UPPR_RPLY_ID = null order by REG_DTM desc limit 5

SELECT p.RPLY_CTT, p.REG_DTM FROM RPLY_HSTR AS p LEFT JOIN RPLY_HSTR AS c ON p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = c.RPLY_ID WHERE (p.POI_ID = #{poiId} OR p.CONT_TYPE_ID = #{contTypeId}) AND p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = #{upprRplyId} ORDER BY p.REG_DTM DESC
